text: Va kasone az ahli kitoʙ hastand, ki ʙa Alloh taolo va on ci ʙar şumo nozil şuda va on ci ʙar xudaşon nozil şudaast, imon dorand; dar ʙaroʙari Alloh taolo furūtan hastand va ojoti Allohro ʙa ʙahoi nocize namefuruşand. Inonand, ki podoşaşon nazdi Parvardigoraşon [mahfuz] ast. Ba rostī, ki Alloh taolo dar hisoʙrasī sare' ast
